chart_description: The System Load Average chart is used to show the average system utilization over a certain period of time. It is measured by the amount of work that the system is doing, divided by the capacity of the system.

dimension_descriptions.load1: This dimension represents the average system utilization over the last minute.
dimension_descriptions.load5: This dimension represents the average system utilization over the last 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.load15: This dimension represents the average system utilization over the last 15 minutes.
